name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
setup: Hold dumbbells at sides, palms facing inward
Slight bend in elbows, core engaged
steps: Raise dumbbells out to sides in a wide arc
Raise until arms are parallel to floor
Lower with control back to starting position
cues: Stop at shoulder height (parallel to floor)
safety: Use light weight to maintain form. Stop if you feel shoulder impingement. Avoid if you have shoulder pain.

prescriptionHints.notes: Isolation exercise for lateral deltoids. Use strict form with controlled tempo. Leave ego at the door - light weight is effective.

joints.notes: Common area for impingement. Stop at shoulder height and use controlled movement.
